Award.definition: to give in accordance with a judicial or administrative determination or decision [ punitive damages] 2
Award.origin: [Anglo-French awarder agarder to look at, decide on, impose, alteration of Old French esguarder to look at, from es -, intensive prefix + guarder to guard]

sub_terms.b: a formal decision regarding benefits in a workers' compensation claim

2.definition: something granted esp. on the basis of merit or entitlement

sub_terms.a: a contract won by a successful bidder
sub_terms.b: relief usually in the form of money (as damages or alimony) granted to a party in a legal proceeding
